icpLegends.Data Scientists & Analytics: Own product/growth questions, metrics, and ad-hoc analysis in notebooks on top of the warehouse.
icpLegends.ML Engineers: Ship models and experiments (ranking, prediction, forecasting) from repos and notebooks.
icpLegends.Scientific Research: Researchers and policy/geo folks using notebooks to clean data, run models, and publish figures or reports.
icpLegends.Quant Research: Quants and trading researchers building models, backtests, and risk tools on internal data & helpers.
icpLegends.Product Engineers & Technical Founders: Hands-on builders who prototype data products, internal tools, and strategies across editor + notebooks.

_disabled_replays.name: Build an SPX Options IV Surface
_disabled_replays.description: Fit an SPX options IV surface from existing dataframes and ship publication-ready plots without rewriting your notebook.

_disabled_replays.name: Crypto Rolling Correlations & Heatmaps
_disabled_replays.description: Turn noisy crypto returns into rolling correlation views and heatmaps that highlight which assets actually move together.

_disabled_replays.name: PM2.5 Air Quality Forecasting (Beijing)
_disabled_replays.description: Extend a real PM2.5 forecasting notebook with new features, model runs, and plots ready for a paper or stakeholder report.

_disabled_replays.name: Gold–Silver Pairs Trading Backtest
_disabled_replays.description: Backtest a cointegration-based GLD/SLV mean-reversion strategy—from spread construction to trade rules and P&L—in one notebook.

_disabled_replays.name: Campaign Spend vs Votes: NYC Elections
_disabled_replays.description: Clean and join messy NYC campaign CSVs, fuzzy-match candidates, and see which campaigns turned dollars into votes most efficiently.

_disabled_replays.name: Global Gold Reserves: 20-Year Country Panel
_disabled_replays.description: Turn a wide country-by-year gold-reserve sheet into a tidy panel, rank gainers/losers from 2002–2022, and generate publication-ready visuals.

_disabled_replays.name: Alpaca Trading Volume by Asset Class
_disabled_replays.description: Break down total trading volume by asset class (stocks, options, crypto), visualize trends over time, and project crossover points between growing categories.

replays.name: Event-to-RSVP Funnel Drop-off (Amplitude + Internal DB)
replays.description: Join Amplitude product events to internal RSVPs, analyze funnel drop-off, and generate a PM-ready narrative of where users churn.

replays.name: Crisis Drawdown Simulator: 2011 Euro Debt Shock
replays.description: Simulate portfolio performance through the 2011 Euro debt crisis, compute drawdowns and recovery times, and visualize risk profiles.

replays.name: NBA Game Outcome Prediction from API Data
replays.description: Pull multi-season NBA data via APIs, engineer features, and train a classifier to predict game outcomes with in-notebook evaluation.

replays.name: A/B Test Analysis of Page Conversion Rates
replays.description: Compare control vs treatment page performance, run proper stats, and turn conversion metrics into a clear ship/hold recommendation.

replays.name: FOMC Event Study: Fed Rates vs Yield Curve
replays.description: Analyze how FOMC rate decisions move the 2y/10y/30y curve with event windows, auto-generated plots, and commentary on inversions.

replays.name: Sector Rotation Backtest: ETF Momentum Strategy
replays.description: Prototype a sector ETF momentum strategy—pull prices, define rules, backtest, and compare against SPY and equal-weight benchmarks.

replays.name: Alpaca Regulatory Compliance Dashboard
replays.description: Pull trade error rates and net capital ratios from PostgreSQL, assess SEC Rule 15c3-1 compliance, and surface open exceptions with FINRA exam risk.

replays.name: Human Interest: 401(k) AUM Growth Analysis
replays.description: Track total AUM growth across 401(k) plans, decompose organic contributions vs market appreciation, and project the path to $15B.

replays.name: Incident.io ARR by Product Line
replays.description: Break down ARR across Incident Response, On-Call, and Status Pages, visualize the product mix shift, and project when On-Call overtakes IR.

replays.name: Loop Returns: Exchange Rate & Revenue Retention
replays.description: Measure platform-wide exchange-vs-refund rates, quantify revenue retained per percentage point shift, and analyze peak-season trends.

replays.name: Recurrency: Before vs After Revenue & Margin Lift
replays.description: Compare per-customer order value, margin, and frequency before and after Recurrency go-live to quantify the platform's impact.

replays.name: Shaped: CTR Lift from Recommendation Engine
replays.description: Analyze A/B test results across verticals to measure Shaped's CTR lift, and show how catalog size and data volume drive recommendation quality.
